Articles.Content:
So, I never made a thread for post 100, 200 or 300, so here is 350!

I hope I am getting more recognized on the forums!

Are you guys ready for a good story and a good craft?

I know I am, but I need 1.0 first!

Thanks for the fun times here.

And no I am not leaving.

This is just the beginning.

-DMSP

[Edit]:

Now past 400!

[Edit]:

Post 500! Yes! 191 Rep btw

[Edit]:

600+ posts, the meter just fly by!

[Edit]:

All of a sudden I'm at 712!

[Edit]:

No I'm at 894. I've come a long way since I first joined...

[Edit]:

Past 900 now!

[Edit]:

975. Almost there.

[Edit]:

994. Wow.

[Edit]:

999 posts. This is it!

Well, that's it. 1,000!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-09-09T19:51:36Z" title="09/09/2015 07:51  PM" data-short="8 yr">September 9, 2015</time> by DMSP**

> 
> I am getting more recognized on the forums

Hmmmm yheeaaa, I...kinda be like the guy that don't think this is how it should work:huh:

But don't mind me!!!
A bit out of section, probably should go in the Space Lounge or Kerbal Network.

Lol I changed it just know.

I didn't sound right...

- - - Updated - - -

Anyone up for a concorde like SSTO?

- - - Updated - - -

And a cargo version?

Moved to the Space Lounge.

Please make sure your threads are in the correct sections in future. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Moved to the Space Lounge.
> Please make sure your threads are in the correct sections in future. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Thanks again vexx.

I really need to go over the guidlines and sections again...

You only has 349

Is this mah 250th?

- - - Updated - - -

awwwww

> 
> You only has 349
> Is this mah 250th?
> 
> - - - Updated - - -
> 
> awwwww

Wait...

- - - Updated - - -

There we go!
Writing posts in this part of the forum doesn't trigger the post counter, so you have more than that.

> 
> Writing posts in this part of the forum doesn't trigger the post counter, so you have more than that.

That would explain the confusion I was having. I must have made around 10 posts in one of the games threads and the counter sat at 1039. There was much eyebrow furrowing that day.
Yeah, I blew through ALL those milestones without making a peep about it! ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
No offense, but who are you? I know Micheal, cause of his avatar. But not you

> 
> No offense, but who are you? I know Micheal, cause of his avatar. But not you

no offense taken, I've been around, just been a liitle too lazy to get an avatar at this time.

I wouldn't get excited until 1,000 posts, or at least 500. I know I first openly exclaimed my excitement for a post amount at 1,000.

Nevertheless, if you're proud of it then good job! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> That would explain the confusion I was having. I must have made around 10 posts in one of the games threads and the counter sat at 1039. There was much eyebrow furrowing that day.

I have about 47 on the games part of the forums.

Now I can confirm that it counts one post per forum. I think...
I'm not gonna get excited "till I beat salvager, a hundred years in the future.....

> 
> I'm not gonna get excited "till I beat salvager, a hundred years in the future.....

Salvager? Who is he/she?

> 
> Salvager? Who is he/she?

Sal\_vager, head global mod, as I recall.

You know, the one with the giant 3D happy face as his avatar.

EDIT: Profile link: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/16436-sal_vager](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/16436-sal_vager)

Gee, trust DMSP to make such a fuss.

Just kidding, 350 post is an important milestone; you're no longer 'that new guy'!

> 
> Sal\_vager, head global mod, as I recall.
> You know, the one with the giant 3D happy face as his avatar.
> 
> EDIT: Profile link: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/16436-sal_vager](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/16436-sal_vager)

Wow, I totally derped! I guess I've met him before, but he way it was typed on the post above mine, I failed to recognize it!

> 
> Gee, trust DMSP to make such a fuss.
> Just kidding, 350 post is an important milestone; you're no longer 'that new guy'!

Haha!

Thanks.

Also, you were like the 4th person I met here!
Congrats.

Congratulations! Next objective: 3,500 posts. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I remember when I cared about my post count. I had under 100 back then.

Suddenly I have 1,800 and counting. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) It seems to accelerate.

I'm at 400!

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> Congratulations! Next objective: 3,500 posts. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
> I remember when I cared about my post count. I had under 100 back then.
> 
> Suddenly I have 1,800 and counting. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) It seems to accelerate.

No kidding, you're past 2,100 now...

> 
> I'm at 400!
> - - - Updated - - -
> 
> No kidding, you're past 2,100 now...

Oh, hey, look at that. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
